content: Updates: Hasina sentenced to death, Bangladesh demands India extradite her Former PM Sheikh Hasina was tried in absentia for her governments deadly crackdown on student-led protests last year. Published On 17 Nov 2025 This live page is now closed. Former PM Sheikh Hasina was tried in absentia for her governments deadly crackdown on student-led protests last year. This live page is now closed.
title: Updates: Hasina sentenced to death, Bangladesh demands India extradite her | Sheikh Hasina News | Al Jazeera
